skins.shipDescription: Farragut-class destroyer ¨C Dewey, Hull Number DD-349.
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the Farragut-class destroyer, Dewey. I took part in many carrier convoys and support missions. I pride myself on my service history! Although... I sadly couldn't save two of my sister ships who were in trouble... Typhoons can be frighteningly strong...
skins.acquisition: I'm Dewey, I'm a destroyer. If there's anything I can help with, please just say the word. Whatever I'm tasked with, I'll give it my all!
skins.login: Welcome back, Commander. Could we inspect the port's emergency relief supplies? You never know when disaster might strike.
skins.details: Is there something on your mind, Commander? Something you need my help for...?
skins.secretaryIdle1: I love listening to music. My favorite song is made by Lexington!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Eep! S-Sorry, Commander! Typhoons and thunder are just too scary for me...
skins.secretaryIdle3: The caring Yorktown, the cool Enterprise, the peppy Saratoga... The Eagle Union has good people left and right.
skins.secretaryTouch: My hair is a little messy? Oh, thank you for pointing it out! Please let me return the favor by giving you a massage later!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hm...? My chest doesn't hurt, so why'd you do that?

skins.shipDescription: Saratoga went over there, and Lexington is... Oh, Commander, good morning! Are you here to play with us, or were you just out for some fresh air...?
skins.acquisition: Saratoga went over there, and Lexington is... Oh, Commander, good morning! Are you here to play with us, or were you just out for some fresh air...?
skins.login: According to the weather forecast, it's gonna be real sunny today.
skins.details: What's in this notebook? Well, um... It's a story about a girl chasing after the person she longs for the most in her dream... Y-you want to read it? Fine... Ah, um! Please promise to keep it a secret from Miss Lexington!
skins.secretaryIdle1: If you want to know where Saratoga is, I think I saw her playing beach volleyball with the others?
skins.secretaryIdle2: I seem to be a bit too tired to swim... so I'll just enjoy the feeling of rocking around in this floaty ring...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Does anyone need any help? ...Thank goodness, looks like everyone is doing well...
skins.secretaryTouch: C-Commander, please don't play with my floaty ring. You're going to get my notebook wet...

skins.shipDescription: Lexington gave me this Christmas costume as a thank-you for always supporting her. Commander, do you think I look... pretty in it?
skins.acquisition: Lexington gave me this Christmas costume as a thank-you for always supporting her. Commander, do you think I look... pretty in it?
skins.login: Merry Christmas, Commander. Umm, may you have a happy holy night.
skins.details: I'd like to give Lexington a very special present for Christmas... What would you suggest, Commander?
skins.secretaryIdle1: The star at the top of the Christmas tree... I wonder what it could mean?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, don't forget to greet everyone on Christmas. Everyone's looking forward to seeing you.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Gridley took lots of pictures of Lexington for me. I ought to thank her later.
skins.secretaryTouch: E-Ever since I put on this costume, Benson has been really staring me down...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Pl-Please don't play around with the bells!
